General.Name: DAEMO Engineering Co. Ltd
General.Description: DAEMO Engineering Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells hydraulic attachments worldwide. It provides attachments to quarries, mines, construction sites, recycling industries, and public works. Its products include hydraulic breakers, concrete crushers, shears, quick coupler, and various kinds of attachments for excavator. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Siheung, South Korea.
